ID: CMVDSKO_00
From: Alya Al Ameeri <AAlameeri@amrc.ae>
To: Sharon Pinto <Sharon.Pinto@chalhoub.com>; Hagop Ghazarian <Hagop.Ghazarian@chalhoub.com>
CC: Grace Milan <Grace.Milan@chalhoub.com>; Rebecca Lane <RLane@amrc.ae>; Government Affairs <Government.Affairs@chalhoub.com>; May Karaki <May.Karaki@chalhoub.com>; Connie Madeira <Connie.Madeira@chalhoub.com>; Mary Janice Dofeliz <MaryJanice.Dofeliz@chalhoub.com>
BCC: 
Date: 2024-11-14 07:58
Subject: Tory Burch Unit 28SU & Tumi Unit 10015, The Galleria Al Maryah Island - Trade Licence Renewal
--------------------------------------------------
CAUTION: This email originated from outside of the organization. Do not click links or open attachments unless you recognize the sender and know the content is safe. 
تم إرسال هذا البريد الإلكتروني من خارج مجموعة شلهوب. لا تنقر على الروابط أو تفتح المرفقات إلا إذا كنت تعرف المرسل وتعلم أنه آمن


Dear All,

 

Your ADGM trade licence for Tory Burch and Tumi is due to expire on 21 November 2024.  We would like to take this opportunity to remind you to renew this on time and provide us with a copy as soon as you have done so.

 

Please note that you are obliged to obtain and at all times maintain your ADGM trade licence under the terms of your Lease. 

 

Please let me know if you have any questions.

 

Regards,

 

 

Alya Al Ameeri​​​​

Dear All,

 

Your ADGM trade licence for Tory Burch and Tumi is due to expire on 21 November 2024.  We would like to take this opportunity to remind you to renew this on time and provide us with a copy as soon as you have done so.

 

Please note that you are obliged to obtain and at all times maintain your ADGM trade licence under the terms of your Lease. 

 

Please let me know if you have any questions.

 

Regards,

 

 

Alya Al Ameeri​​​​

Ethics & Compliance Executive
